item.title: 5 DIY Tech Projects for Beginners
item.description: Technology has become an essential part of our daily lives. With the rise of smart devices, people are looking for ways to enhance their homes with tech.

title: “How to Flash Armbian with Balena Etcher” date: 2023-02-18 publishdate: 2023-02-18 image: “/images/blog/8.jpg” tags: [“DIY”, “self-hosted”, “automation”] comments: false Armbian is a Debian-based operating system designed for ARM-based devices.
